name: Days of Dawn \u2013 turn-based RPG with unique magic system
blurb: Fantastic open world exploration meets a unique magic system and fast turn-based combat in this most beautiful roleplaying game.

rewards.reward: ON THE WATCH: Get our kickstarter-updates, access to the backer-exclusive forum (as all backers do), a Days of Dawn RINGTONE and a WALLPAPER, both backer-exclusive.
EARLY BIRD: Download the DRM-free game for PC, Mac and Linux plus a backer-exclusive wallpaper and ringtone. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013.
GAME DOWNLOAD: Download the DRM-free game for PC, Mac and Linux plus a backer-exclusive wallpaper and ringtone. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013.

MUSIC-BUNDLE: Get the soundtrack as DRM-free MP3/FLAC and download two copies of the DRM-free game for PC, Mac and Linux plus a backer-exclusive wallpaper and ringtone. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013.

DIGI-BUNDLE: Get the games soundtrack as DRM-free MP3/FLAC, the PDF-artbook and download two copies of the DRM-free game for PC, Mac and Linux plus a backer-exclusive wallpaper and ringtone. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013.

DIGITAL QUARTET: Get four download copies of the DRM-free game for PC, Mac and Linux for the price of three plus a backer-exclusive wallpaper and ringtone. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013.

EARLY BIRD: Backer-exclusive COLLECTOR'S SPECIAL EDITION (includes an additional sidequest, unlocking an eighth playable character). Comes in a beautiful box containing the printed hardcover Artbook, Soundtrack-CD, manual and Game-CD for PC, Mac and Linux (CD includes wallpaper and ringtone). Access to the closed beta starting June 2013 and you'll get five download copies of the game.

Backer-exclusive COLLECTOR'S SPECIAL EDITION (includes an additional sidequest, unlocking an eighth playable character). Comes in a beautiful box containing the printed hardcover Artbook, Soundtrack-CD, manual and Game-CD for PC, Mac and Linux (CD includes wallpaper and ringtone). Access to the closed beta starting June 2013 and you'll get five download copies of the game.

ARTWORK SUPER-DEAL: You love Days of Dawn's artwork? Then this is your deal! Get the Collector's Special Edition (see above) plus the 16,5x11,5"/A3 WALL CALENDER plus the signed Vaithee fine-print (16,5x11,5"/A3) plus a PRINTED CREATURE ENCYCLOPEDIA in one attractive package! Access to the closed beta starting June 2013 and you'll get five download copies of the game.

NAME SOMETHING: Get the backer-exclusive Collector's Special Edition (like above) and FIND YOUR NAME IN THE GAME (like in Sword of John, Town of Doe\u2026). You decide what you want to get named. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013 and you'll get five download copies of the game.

GET IMMORTAL: This tier will have you erect a statue of your liking in Days of Dawn. Be it one of yourself or a person you love or admire, our scenery artist Tyler Edlin will paint the person as a statue and we'll place it into a beautiful location in Days of Dawn. You'll also get a fine print of the statue and a personal thank-you letter from Tassilo, will be allowed to NAME SOMETHING (see above) and get all the rewards from the $100 tier (Collector's Edition)

DESIGN A SIDEQUEST & CREATURE: This is your chance to become a game-designer \u2013 you'll get to design a side-quest for Days of Dawn in cooperation with Philipp and design a creature which will be painted and brought to live by creature-artist Nadia. You'll also get a fine print of the creature and a personal thank-you letter from Tassilo, will be allowed to NAME SOMETHING (see above) and get all the rewards from the $100 tier (Collector's Edition)

Ever dreamed of being part of a fantasy world? Make your dream come true \u2013 with this reward you'll BECOME A NON-PLAYER CHARACTER to be met in the game, painted by our character artist Anako and send you a framed fine print of the painting.  Includes the backer exclusive Collector's Special Edition, seven download copies and you'll be able to name something in the game.\r\n Access to the closed beta starting June 2013. Additionally you'll get lifetime download-access to all Bumblebee games ever to be released.

Want it to be more special? You can also BECOME AN INN-KEEPER, painted by our character artist Anako. You'll be able to design your inn (based on a few limitations in terms of size and design) and will be one of the most important and most visited NPCs in the game. We will also send you a framed fine print of the painting, a pesonal thank-you letter and will be allowed to name something. Includes the backer exclusive Collector's Special Edition, seven download copies and you'll be able to name something in the game. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013. Additionally you'll get lifetime download-access to all Bumblebee games ever to be released.

Okay, now this is very, very, very special \u2013 you are going to BECOME A HERO! With this gift we'll transform a photo of you into one of the games seven available player characters and send you a framed fine print of the painting. Includes the backer exclusive Collector's Special Edition, ten download copies and you'll be able to name something in the game. Access to the closed beta starting June 2013. Additionally you'll get lifetime download-access to all Bumblebee games ever to be released, the Vaithee-poster, Artwork-Calender and Monster Encyclopedia.

PRODUCER-BUNDLE: With this package you will be credited as "EXECUTIVE PRODUCER" in the game, be portrayed as AN INN-KEEPER, be able to create YOUR OWN MONSTER, which our creature department will transform into one of Days of Dawn's animated creatures, design a DUNGEON and a SIDEQUEST (within some limitations to be discussed), and NAME A TOWN. Last but not least you will become invited to a great night out with many of our team-members during the gamescom 2013 in Cologne, worlds largest game trade fair (travel cost not included).  Includes a team-signed version of the backer exclusive Collector's Special Edition and ten download copies.  Access to the closed beta starting June 2013. Additionally you'll get lifetime download-access to all Bumblebee games ever to be released, the Vaithee-poster, Artwork-Calender and Monster Encyclopedia.

COMMERCIAL SPONSORING: If your company would like to support Days of Dawn, we'll display your logo with a "Made possible due to the generous support from \u2026" in the game's intro. Also includes a download copy of the game for each employee (up to 150). Of course you'll also be able to join the beta starting in June 2013 and get the boxed collector's edition and lifetime access to all bumblebee-games ever to be released. Thank you, you're awesome!
